title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Azul Board Game - Next Move

**Product Description:**

Azul is a popular family board game designed by Michael Riesling, where 2-4 players compete to create the most beautiful mosaic. The game revolves around the theme of patterns, where players must strategically plan and collect the right tiles to outdo their opponents.

**Product Features:**

- Brand: Next Move
- Material: High-quality paper components
- Theme: Patterns
- Genre: Family-friendly
- Number of Players: 2-4 (perfect for small gatherings and family game nights)
- Designer: Michael Riesling

**Gameplay Overview:**

In Azul, players take on the role of artisans, competing to create the most beautiful mosaic. The game involves strategic planning, tile collection, and pattern creation. With simple rules and engaging gameplay, Azul is an excellent addition to any board game collection.

**What's Included:**

- Game board
- High-quality paper components (tiles, player boards, etc.)
- Rulebook

**Order Now:**

Get ready to experience the thrill of Azul with your friends and family. Order now and discover why this game has become a modern classic in the world of board games.
